School time! Morning time! Brushing time!

No wait! Do we wake up in the morning and go to school?

If yes, then in that case, we know what we do before we leave for school, don't we?  

Let's discuss. We wake up. We brush our teeth, we have a bath. We eat breakfast? We wear our uniform and leave for school. 

Ummm, do you brush your teeth when you are at home? 

Some children feel lazy to brush. Like Rohan. Rohan thinks that his dog Jimmy does not have to brush. So why should he? 

Well, he has a smart sister Riya. She tells him a secret why we should brush our teeth. Let's go to the next story to share this secret.
